Package org.jcatapult.mvc.validation.annotation

Annotation Types Summary
Required This annotation is a validation annotation that indicates a field is required.
Valid This annotation marks a field in a bean as requiring validation.
ValidateMethod This annotation is used to mark a method of an action as a validate method.
ValidatorAnnotation This annotation marks an annotation as being a validator annotation.
ValidCollection This annotation marks a List or Array in a bean as requiring validation.
ValidMap This annotation marks a Map in a bean as requiring validation.
